## connectDatabaseEmulator() function

Modify the provided instance to communicate with the Realtime Database emulator.

<p>Note: This method must be called before performing any other operation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function connectDatabaseEmulator(db: Database, host: string, port: number, options?: {
    mockUserToken?: EmulatorMockTokenOptions;
}): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  db | [Database](./database.database.md) | The instance to modify. |
|  host | string | The emulator host (ex: localhost) |
|  port | number | The emulator port (ex: 8080) |
|  options | { mockUserToken?: EmulatorMockTokenOptions; } |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
